A Contour and Scatter Plot
of the Method of Steepest Descent

# Learn about API authentication here: /python/getting-started
# Find your api_key here: /settings/api

    line=Line(

plot_url = py.plot(data, filename='contour-scatter')

Line Chart and a Bar Chart

# Learn about API authentication here: /python/getting-started
# Find your api_key here: /settings/api

import plotly.plotly as py
from plotly.graph_objs import *

trace1 = Scatter(
    x=[0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5],
    y=[1.5, 1, 1.3, 0.7, 0.8, 0.9]
)
trace2 = Bar(
    x=[0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5],
    y=[1, 0.5, 0.7, -1.2, 0.3, 0.4]
)
data = Data([trace1, trace2])
plot_url = py.plot(data, filename='bar-line')
Plotly

Plotly is the easiest and fastest way to graph and share your data online.
